nosqlbench 5.23.0-SNAPSHOT
  1. io.nosqlbench.scenarios.simframe.capture
  2. SimFrameCapture

Uses of Class
io.nosqlbench.scenarios.simframe.capture.SimFrameCapture

Packages that use SimFrameCapture
Package
Description
io.nosqlbench.scenarios.simframe.capture
The types in this package are used to define observable dependent variables, specify how they are measured, formulate them into a value function, and provide a view of these over time as frames are executed.
